text: Lotta på Liseberg is a sing-along event at Liseberg in the town of Gothenburg in Sweden. It has been around since 21 June 2004. Broadcastings over TV 4 began on 22 June 2009. Since the beginning, Lotta Engberg has been the host. ==Other websites== * Official website Category:2004 establishments in Sweden Category:Music events Category:Television programs
title: Lotta på Liseberg
